code: export default function convertDate(date){var unix_timestamp=date;var dates=new Date(unix_timestamp*1000);var day=dates.getDate();var month=dates.getMonth()+1;var year=dates.getFullYear();var hours=dates.getHours();var minutes="0"+dates.getMinutes();return hours+':'+minutes.substr(-2)+"  "+day+'.'+month+'.'+year;}
